title: Smart Food Management System
description: Food Donation Platform: Developed a platform to connect hotels and NGOs, facilitating the donation of surplus food to reduce wastage.
Real-Time Monitoring: Integrated a dashboard for tracking food requests, donations, and hotel food waste in real time.
Community Impact: Enhanced food redistribution efforts, reducing food wastage and supporting underprivileged communities.
note: Note :- This is the inhouse software product of my company so I cannot share the source code.

title: Smart Waste Management System
description: IoT-Driven Waste Monitoring: Integrated IoT sensors to track waste levels in real-time, optimizing collection routes and reducing overflow.
Data-Driven Insights: Implemented data analytics to monitor waste patterns, enabling predictive analysis and better resource allocation.
Sustainability Focus: Promoted environmental sustainability by streamlining waste management processes and reducing carbon emissions.

title: TechBridge Innovations Private Limited
description: Designed and built intuitive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure a smooth user experience.
API Development: Created and integrated RESTful APIs to enable seamless communication between the front end and back end.
Focused on developing smart, tech-driven solutions that promote efficiency and innovation across different sectors.

title: Bus Tracking System
description: Real-Time Tracking: Developed a system to track buses in real time, enhancing reliability and reducing waiting times for students and staff.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed an intuitive app interface for easy access to bus routes, arrival times, and notifications.
Live Notifications: Implemented instant alerts to inform users of delays, route changes, or arrivals, ensuring smooth communication.

title: AV Hall Booking System
description: Smart Booking System: Developed an efficient AV hall reservation system allowing users to book slots seamlessly based on availability.
Conflict-Free Scheduling: Integrated real-time calendar syncing to prevent double bookings and ensure smooth scheduling for all users.
Email & SMS Alerts: Enabled automated notifications to confirm bookings, send reminders, or notify about changes instantly.

title: AI Chatbot
description: Conversational AI: Developed an intelligent chatbot using ChatGPT's interface for seamless and human-like interactions.
Multi-Model Integration: Combined DeepSeek for advanced logic and Claude for smart account management capabilities.
Live Deployment: Hosted on a web platform with real-time responses, ensuring 24/7 accessibility and performance.

title: Website Safety Checker
description: URL Threat Analysis: Built a tool that scans and evaluates website URLs for potential phishing, malware, and other online threats.
Real-Time Safety Scoring: Implemented a dynamic scoring system using threat intelligence APIs to classify websites as Safe, Warning, or Unsafe.
User-Focused Interface: Designed a clean, responsive UI that allows users to quickly check any link's safety with instant results.

title: QR Code Generator
description: Instant QR Generation: Developed a tool to generate QR codes in real time for URLs, text, contact info, and more.
Customizable Output: Enabled users to download QR codes in multiple formats with options to customize size and color.
Responsive Interface: Designed a user-friendly web layout accessible on both desktop and mobile devices for seamless use.
